services.shortDescription: Comprehensive cybersecurity services to protect your digital assets and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

subcategories.title: Data Privacy Compliance
subcategories.description: Stay compliant. Build trust. Safeguard your data.
subcategories.overviewDescription: Our data privacy compliance services are designed to help businesses of all sizes build secure data environments, reduce regulatory risks, and foster customer trust. From audits to consent management, we support your compliance journey with structured, realistic guidance

features.title: GDPR Compliance
features.description: We support your organisation in implementing GDPR-aligned practices by conducting data mapping, privacy impact assessments, and process reviews. Our approach ensures your data handling procedures meet the requirements of the UK and EU data protection frameworks.

features.title: Data Audit
features.description: We carry out detailed audits to identify the personal data you collect, process, store, and share. This helps establish transparency, highlight risks, and ensure your data flows align with current regulatory expectations.

features.title: Privacy Policy Development
features.description: We assist in drafting or updating privacy policies that reflect your real-world data practices. These documents are written clearly, meet legal standards, and help build trust with users, regulators, and partners.

features.title: Consent Management
features.description: We help implement and configure consent management systems that enable lawful data collection and user preference tracking. These solutions support opt-in/opt-out mechanisms and maintain a verifiable record of user consent for compliance purposes.

subcategories.detailedDescription: We provide practical, business-aligned support across core areas of data protection. Whether youâ€™re preparing for a new regulation or strengthening existing practices, we help ensure your approach to data privacy is compliant, efficient, and defensible.

subcategories.description: Robust application security services designed to minimise risk and support regulatory compliance.
subcategories.overviewDescription: We offer practical and scalable security solutions for web and mobile applications. Our services are designed to help protect against common vulnerabilities and align with established security best practices

features.title: SSL/TLS Implementation
features.description: Deployment and configuration of SSL/TLS certificates to help encrypt data in transit and establish secure connections between end-users and your application.

features.title: XSS Protection
features.description: We apply measures such as input validation, output encoding, and Content Security Policies (CSP) to help reduce the risk of Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.

features.title: SQL Injection Prevention
features.description: Use of secure coding techniques, including parameterised queries and input validation, to mitigate vulnerabilities related to SQL injection.

features.title: Security Headers
features.description: Implementation of HTTP security headers (e.g. HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options) to reinforce browser-level defences against common threats.

subcategories.detailedDescription: Our team helps strengthen the security posture of your digital platforms. From secure communication protocols to vulnerability mitigation, we support your efforts to minimise exposure to cyber risks.

features.title: Session Management
features.description: Secure session handling with timeouts, encrypted tokens, and safeguards against session hijacking or misuse.
